name: Jason The Greek - Point'n'Click Adventures in Ancient Greece
blurb: FINAL WEEK: A point and click adventure set in Ancient Greece? You'd FETA believe it! It's Jason and The Argonauts meets Captain Kirk!

rewards.reward:
Toga in the City! (US $1.60 / CAN $1.90)
==============================

I WILL STAND IN Trafalgar Square, dressed in a Toga and thank you by name – via the medium of YouTube!
Khaaaaannn you spare \u00a32? ($3.30 / $3.50) ============================== DRM-Free DOWNLOAD of the game post-launch including Kickstarter exclusive thank you in intro!
Get Down Early ($6 / $7)\r\n==============================\r\nDRM-Free DOWNLOAD of the game upon launch including Kickstarter exclusive mini-quest content!
Get Down For Less ($8 / $9) ============================== DRM-Free download of the game on launch + In-game credit
Get Down ($13 / $14)\r\n==============================\r\nDRM-Free download of the game + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game credit

Alpha Gamer ($16 / $17)\r\n==============================\r\nDRM-Free download of the game + Access to the Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF of our Captain + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game credit

Alphabeta Gamer ($25 / $26) ============================== DRM-Free download of the game +  DRM-FreeBeta access to the game +  Access to the Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF of our Captain + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game credit

Zeta Gamer ($32 / $34)\r\n==============================\r\nDVD copy of the game + Jason The Greek Poster + Paper cut-out Captain + Pin Badge + DRM-Free download of the game + Access to the Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF of our Captain + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game credit

Statuesque Physical! ($48 / $51) ============================== In-game statue bust of yourself! + DVD copy of the game + Access to Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF's of our Captain AND your statue + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game credit + PDF cut-out Captain

Statuesque! ($48 / $51)\r\n==============================\r\nIn-game statue bust of yourself! + DRM-Free download of the game + Access to Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF's of our Captain AND your statue + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game credit + PDF cut-out Captain

Getting Personal ($64 / $67)\r\n==============================\r\nPersonalised intro monologue + In-game statue bust of yourself! + DRM-Free download of the game + Access to Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF's of our Captain AND your statue + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game credit + PDF cut-out Captain

Go Big! ($80 / $84)\r\n==============================\r\nBIG BOX packaging + DRM-Free Beta access to the game and full copy + Art of JTG PDF book + Personalised intro monologue + In-game statue bust of yourself! + Digital download of the game + Access to Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF's of our Captain AND your statue + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game credit + PDF cut-out Captain

Learning Up! ($128 / $135)\r\n==============================\r\nHalf a day learning on art or dev + All the art from the demo + Your own level in your copy of the game + DRM-Free Beta access to the game + Art of JTG PDF book + Personalised intro monologue + In-game statue bust of yourself! + Digital download of the game + Big Box packaging + Access to Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF's of our Captain AND your statue + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game credit + PDF cut-out Captain

Cannon Fodder ($193 / $202)\r\n==============================\r\nGET IN THE GAME as a Red Skirt + CHOOSE THE WAY YOU DIE! + High-res PDF of your character + Beta access to the game + Art of JTG PDF book + Personalised intro monologue + In-game statue bust of yourself! + Digital download of the game + Big Box packaging + Access to Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF's of our Captain AND your statue + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game credit + PDF cut-out Captain

Get Your Greek On! ($244, $259)\r\n============================== \r\nGet in the game as a Lemnosian Guard! + Signed LIMITED EDITION Big Box packaging INCLUDING SIGNED PRINTED ART BOOK INSIDE + DRM-Free Beta access to the game + Art of JTG PDF book + Personalised intro monologue + In-game statue bust of yourself! + Digital download of the game + Access to Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF's of our Captain AND your statue + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game 'LEARNED' credit + PDF cut-out Captain

Go Greek! ($244, $259)\r\n============================== \r\nHalf a day one-on-one learning on game art or dev + Your own level and artwork added into your unique copy of Jason The Greek + All the art from a room of your choice + Signed LIMITED EDITION Big Box packaging INCLUDING SIGNED PRINTED ART BOOK INSIDE + DRM-Free Beta access to the game + Art of JTG PDF book + Personalised intro monologue + In-game statue bust of yourself! + Digital download of the game + Access to Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF's of our Captain AND your statue + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game 'LEARNED' credit + PDF cut-out Captain

Opening Up! ($805 / $842)\r\n==============================\r\nName a character in-game + Your own level added as a mini-quest into the Kickstarter copies of the game + All the art from a room of your choice + Signed LIMITED EDITION DVD copy + DRM-Free Beta access to the game + Art of JTG PDF book + Personalised intro monologue + In-game statue bust of yourself AS A GOD! + Signed LIMITED EDITION DVD or Big Box packaging + Digital download of the game + Access to Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF's of our Captain AND your statue + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game 'PRODUCER' credit + PDF cut-out Captain.

Toga, Toga, Toga! ($1610 / $1680)\r\n==============================\r\nInvitation to launch party for you and a plus 1 + Your logo in opening credits + Name a character in-game + Your own 2 level mini-quest added to the Jason The Greek website for all to enjoy + All the art from a room of your choice + Signed LIMITED EDITION BIG BOX packaging + DRM-FreeBeta access to the game + Art of JTG PDF book + Personalised intro monologue + In-game statue bust of yourself AS A GOD! + Digital download of the game + Access to Captain's personal blog + 3 x high-res wallpapers + High-res PDF's of our Captain AND your statue + Digital copy of soundtrack + In-game 'DIRECTOR' credit + PDF cut-out Captain.
